title: Weather Dashboard
description: Developed a weather dashboard that fetches real-time weather data from a public API and presents it with clean UI using HTML, CSS.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Built a complete e-commerce solution with shopping cart, user authentication, product filters, and admin dashboard.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Crafted a sleek and responsive portfolio to showcase my projects and technical skills using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

title: Task Manager App
description: Developed a productivity app for managing daily tasks with user authentication, due dates, and priority sorting.

title: Real-time Chat App
description: Created a real-time chat application using Socket.IO with support for private rooms and message history.

title: AI Mentor Assistant
description: Built an AI-based mentorship web app to recommend personalized roadmaps for students using Gemini API and Next.js.
